body_html: Send/Recv instructions are not currently implemented on the XLA CPU backend. If you want to do distributed training and use XLA CPU, you can have TF do the send/recv between machines and pass these tensors to the TF sub-graph that you want to compile for XLA CPU. So you would just want to JIT compile the sub-set of the TF graph that runs on each machine, and use TF to do the send/recv between machines.
